Sentencas: The oxidation of Ni to NiO in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) anode will result in large bulk volume change, which may change the interfaces of the two phases in the anode cermet and thus may cause significant performance degradation.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The reduction and oxidation (redox) of the Ni/YSZ cermet were studied at 800 C. Anodic polarization measurements were performed before and after redox cycles.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The anode current density at an overpotential of 100 mV kept decreasing during the whole redox treatment.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: It decreased from 19.11 to 7.95 mA center dot cm(-2) after two redox cycles.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Anode supported unit cell was assembled for cell's discharge measurements.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Cell performance declined after each redox cycle.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The maximum power density decreased from 126.28 to 40.32 mW center dot cm(-2).
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The microstructural changes after redox cycling were recorded using scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The results reveal that after re-oxidation, the Ni gets coarse and has a higher porosity; the nickel network structure turns to be desultory.
Titulo: Electrochemical and microstructural characterization of cyclic redox behaviour of SOFC anodes
